@fiery_godmother @LordLucasCD I personally know one young adult who had a miserable puberty but rose above it for years
Finally diagnosed with depression and told he was asexual
He had a DNA test and testosterone levels done (1/6 th of normal)
Went to a gender clinic under pressure from trans people

@ScottMorrisonMP I live with so much pain every day, also depression and anxiety, I can’t buy clothes shoes, I can’t remember the last time I could buy anything for myself. You’ve taken all my dignity away so now I’m left with nothing. I hope you can enjoy a meal today, I can’t !

@SylviaNakachi Our teenagers are so vulnerable.   I fight for my teenage daughter and her twin brother constantly.   Depression and general hopelessness is real.  Help is hard to resource, as most professionals are overwhelmed.

Except for that burst of anxiety that it creates. I still feel that.

On #WorldMentalHealthDay I’d like to acknowledge all those who think incessantly, worry incessantly and especially the folks who deal with #anxiety while also managing life with #dyslexia #ADHD #autism etc. #Anxiety likes a friend. Your totally badass #warriors.

@librarythingtim Posting means committing to a conversation, not just the time and effort *now*, but unknown amounts of it in future. Or alternatively, the lingering anxiety over having abandoned a conservation where people expected further input but you just never came back.

@j_mcelroy Long ago, when I was a columnist, I felt the anxiety of 10 years approaching. Plus the industry was dying. I panicked. Then I decided to do something else with my life. It was scary and hard, like kicking an addiction. But everyone was much better off.

@EmmetSeanKelly Yes, I'm not sure that article is accurate. High anxiety might mean quick but stupid actions. Swearing is what I do best in an emergency.....that and "tea towel" hurry etc etc when milk spills 😉

This lockdown could go for another two months and I still wouldn't be bothered by it. No socializing, no anxiety from having to talk to people, don't have to make any plans or attend plans made by others, bullies are too worried about getting sick so they've left me alone.
#politas A great time to sell weed. Takes the edge off the boredom and anxiety. The market is booming as it should be #covid19
I'm finding it so hard yo breathe. Its like all my chest is blocked with thicker oxygen. This makes no sense. Might have to call an ambulance soon. And no its not an anxiety attack.

The anxiety will further worsen as the time passes so it is very important that we maintain a social distance but don't add to social distress.

A large reason why is because of mental health issues. Full time will still I suspect be bad for my mental health. Not as bad as before, but still bad. You've got to do all you can to achieve great mental health.
I've also gotten on top of my mental health. I'm night and day better than I have been. I've had professional help, but a lot of it has been my drive to improve.
